hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
cd /var/lib/jenkins/HOME/Tripapyrus_planning
git fetch origin reajax && git reset --hard origin/reajax
npm install
ionic cordova build browser --prod
cp -r platforms/browser/www/* ../Tripapyrus_planning_browser_releases
cd /var/lib/jenkins/HOME/Tripapyrus_planning_browser_releases
git add . -v
git commit -m 'Commit auto' | true
git push origin master | true
git push site master | true
ssh tripapyrpa@ftp.tripapyrus.com 'cd planning; git checkout -f'
